title: Midnights meditations of death: with pious and profitable observations, and consolations : perused by Francis Quarles a little before his death. / Published by E.B.
author: Buckler, Edward, 1610-1706.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by John Macock [and Roger Daniel], and are to be sold at his house, in White Bear Court, on Adling hill,
